thread.title: Liverpool vs Tottenham: Adam Lallana ‘out of this weekend’s clash with Spurs after not training with Jurgen Klopp’s Reds’
thread.title_full: Liverpool vs Tottenham: Adam Lallana ‘out of this weekend’s clash with Spurs after not training with Jurgen Klopp’s Reds’

author: jgordon
title: Liverpool vs Tottenham: Adam Lallana ‘out of this weekend’s clash with Spurs after not training with Jurgen Klopp’s Reds’
text:
Lallana is set to agree terms on a £150,000-a-week extension to his Liverpool deal. 
Keep up to date with ALL the Liverpool news, gossip, transfers and goals on our club page plus fixtures, results and live match commentary 
The midfielder, 28, has two years left on his current terms after this season but is seen as a key player under Jurgen Klopp. 
Tottenham travel to Anfield on Saturday without a fully fit back-line against the league’s joint highest scorers. 
Left-back Danny Rose is to see a specialist over his knee injury which he suffered away in the 0-0 draw with Sunderland last week. 
There are fears around White Hart Lane that the England international could miss up to a month of action, with stand-in full-back Ben Davies replacing him in the line-up. Related Stories LALLA LAND Adam Lallana scoffs EIGHT meals a day in crazy diet designed to keep up energy levels... after taking cookery lessons with Jurgen Klopp's chef KOP A LOAD OF THAT Adam Lallana to land £150,000-a-week deal after impressing Jurgen Klopp in first half of season Going All in Patrick Kluivert wants Dele Alli and Adam Lallana to ditch England and sign for Paris Saint-Germain Up 'N Adam Adam Lallana's game has hit a different level this season after adding a nasty side to his game on the move Lallana wanted by Barca, Juventus and PSG, Payet sparks interest by going on strike and Ayew off to China BARCALLANA Barcelona lining up amazing swoop for Liverpool playmaker Adam Lallana after his impressive form 
Jan Vertonghen is still not ready to mark his return to the side with an ankle injury keeping him out of Mauricio Pochettino’s matchday squad. 
He is recovering from ligament damage, while Erik Lamela who is nursing a hip problem will also be missing the clash with the Reds. Reuters Dejan Lovren is recovering from a knee injury and is a doubt for the match Reuters 3 Danny Rose is set to miss the whole of February with suspected knee ligament damage 
However a boost for Spurs is that Kieran Tripper looks to have recovered from his own hip problem, but isn’t expect to start in front of the in-form Kyle Walker. 
Klopp could be without centre-backs Ragnar Klavan and Dejan Lovren as well as Lallana for the crucial match. Hull 2-0 Liverpool : Bottom-of-the-table Tigers stun drab Reds as Jurgen Klopp’s horror 2017 continues
